law.catch_line: Applications for villa district development action.

text.section:
Sec. 33-169.14. Applications for villa district development action.
The Department shall review plans for compliance with zoning regulations and for compliance with the site plan review criteria. Denials shall be in writing and shall specifically set forth the grounds for denial. If the plan is disapproved the applicant may appeal to the appropriate Community Zoning Appeals Board in accordance with procedure established for appeals of administrative decision.
